greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A337339(n) - n.
comment: Superficially, it seems that A000027 offers an lower bound for A337339 as there seems to be no negative terms in this sequence, but of course it is not guaranteed.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8191

program: A003961(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 24 2020
